Definition at line 250 of file graph.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $Width === 0 )
                        {
                              $this->ClientWidth = $this->Width - 2 * $this->ClientX - 1;
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $this->ClientWidth = intval( $Width );
                        }
                        
                        if( $Height === 0 )
                        {
                              $this->ClientHeight = $this->Height - 2 * $this->ClientY - 1;
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $this->ClientHeight = intval( $Height );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )

Definition at line 451 of file graph.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $this->Img === false )
                        {
                              $this->draw_client_area();
                        }
                        
                        $this->CoordX = intval( $X );
                        $this->CoordY = intval( $Y );
                        
                        $BlackColor = imagecolorallocate( $this->Img , 0 , 0 , 0 );

                        $Y = intval( $Y );
                        imageline( 
                              $this->Img , $this->ClientX ,  $this->Height - $this->ClientY - $Y , 
                              $this->ClientX + $this->ClientWidth , $this->Height - $this->ClientY - $Y , $BlackColor
                        );

                        $X = intval( $X );
                        imageline( 
                              $this->Img , $this->ClientX + $X , $this->Height - $this->ClientY  , $this->ClientX + $X , 
                              $this->Height - $this->ClientY - $this->ClientHeight , $BlackColor
                        );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )

Definition at line 497 of file graph.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $this->Img === false )
                        {
                              $this->draw_coordinates();
                        }
                        $GreyColor = imagecolorallocate( $this->Img , 0 , 0 , 0 );
                        $dx = $this->ClientWidth / $this->StepsX;
                        for( $i = 0 ; $i < $this->StepsX - 1 ; $i++ )
                        {                       
                              imageline( 
                                    $this->Img , $this->ClientX + $dx * $i , $this->Height - $this->ClientY  , 
                                    $this->ClientX + $dx * $i , $this->Height - $this->ClientY - $this->ClientHeight , $GreyColor
                              );
                        }
                        $dy = $this->ClientHeight / $this->StepsY;
                        for( $i = 0 ; $i < $this->StepsY - 1 ; $i++ )
                        {
                              imageline(
                                    $this->Img , $this->ClientX , $this->ClientY + $dy * $i , $this->ClientX + $this->ClientWidth , 
                                    $this->ClientY + $dy * $i , $BlackColor
                              );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 338 of file graph.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $ClientAreaColor = intval( $ClientAreaColor );
                        
                        $ClientAreaColor = imagecolorallocate( 
                              $this->Img , ( $ClientAreaColor & ( 255 << 16 ) ) >> 16 , 
                              ( $ClientAreaColor & ( 255 << 8 ) ) >> 8 , $ClientAreaColor & 255
                        );
                        
                        $Res = imagefilledrectangle( 
                              $this->Img , $this->ClientX , $this->Height - $this->ClientY , 
                              $this->ClientX + $this->ClientWidth , $this->Height - $this->ClientHeight - $this->ClientY , 
                              $ClientAreaColor
                        );
                        
                        if( $Res === false )
                        {
                              throw( new Exception( 'An error occured while filling client area' ) );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }

Definition at line 296 of file graph.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $CommonAreaColor = intval( $CommonAreaColor );
                        
                        $CommonAreaColor = imagecolorallocate( 
                              $this->Img , ( $CommonAreaColor & ( 255 << 16 ) ) >> 16 , 
                              ( $CommonAreaColor & ( 255 << 8 ) ) >> 8 , $CommonAreaColor & 255
                        );
                        
                        $Res = imagefill( $this->Img , 0 , 0 , $CommonAreaColor );
                        
                        if( $Res === false )
                        {
                              throw( new Exception( 'An error occured while setting graph background' ) );
                        }
                  }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $c = count( $DataY );
                        
                        if( $DataX === false )
                        {
                              $DataX = array();
                              for( $i = 0 ; $i < $c ; $i++ )
                              {
                                    $DataX [] = $i;
                              }
                              $TotalClientWidth = $this->ClientWidth - $this->CoordX;
                        }
                        else
                        {

                        }
